description:
The Third Singularity Party. "The Security Organization for the Preservation of Humanity, Fenis Chaldea." Here, a large number of Servants gather, proudly spending their days under the command of their Master. However, the Servants face a secret problem... They are divided by a sense of inequality. Longer waits between deployment, levels never being raised... Reality hits the Servants hard, and frustrations gradually build up. In order to correct such disparities, one Servant steps up... The Fourth Singularity Party, MAX Bond Channel. "I feel like Master`s been more cold to me recently." Ereshkigal feels some distance building between herself and Master. In order to increase her appeal, Dumuzid suggests something out of the ordinary: to use a video sharing platform called "ServantTube"! Will Ereshkigal become a famous streamer and grab Master`s attention?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Documentary: Broadening Gap of Heroic Spirits - Heroic Spirit Labor Standards Law
The Documentary: Hirogaru Eirei Kakusa - Eirei Roudoukijunhou
ザ・ドキュメンタリー 拡がる英霊格差 ~英霊労働基準法~
